text: The 1922 Nevada gubernatorial election was held on November 7, 1922. Democratic nominee James G. Scrugham defeated Republican nominee John H. Miller with 53.88% of the vote. ==Primary elections== Primary elections were held on September 5, 1922. ===Democratic primary=== ====Candidates==== *James G. Scrugham, Nevada Public Service Commissioner *James T. Boyd ====Results==== ===Republican primary=== ====Candidates==== *John H. Miller *James Gault ====Results==== ==General election== ===Candidates=== *James G. Scrugham, Democratic *John H. Miller, Republican ===Results=== ==References== 1922 Nevada Gubernatorial
title: 1922 Nevada gubernatorial election
